reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress great-looking, comfortable, and appreciate its soft corduroy material and rich color. The quality is good, with one customer noting the perfect stitching, and they like the button quality, with one mentioning they stay put. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it a great fitting button front dress while others say it's too tight on top. The fabric thickness also gets mixed reviews, with some describing it as thick while others find it thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish the seller had XS size
items.body: Gorgeous, rich navy color and beautiful, thick fabric. The stitching is perfect... But 100% polyester. I’m 5’5” and 115 lbs and ordered a Small. It fits okay, but it’s definitely loose in the waist and shoulders. The dress with the original belt looks a bit cheap, so I recommend bringing your own belt! An XS would have been perfect, but unfortunately, the seller doesn’t offer XS. I’m debating whether to keep it or return it… I just feel a bit big in it. Read more
items.author: Maryna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking dress, very nicely made!
items.body: I like this dress. It's very nicely made and has nice quality buttons-- all around a great looking dress. It's 100% poly, but doesn't feel or look it. I bought a XL because I'm usually a 14, but it's quite large on me. I should add, that I'm closer to a 12 or medium than a 16, it XLI usually wear a large in dresses, and I definitely should have gotten a large. I have a large bust and I was worried about the buttons gaping, but it would have been fine. Also, on the hang tag it says to hand wash which seems odd, but the inside label says cold wash-- if it falls apart after I throw it in the wash I will update my review. Read more
items.author: ninadora

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, Flattering, but Don’t Breathe Too Deep
items.body: The fit is a little snug in the chest (and I have small breasts), so I can only imagine the button drama if I gain an ounce. That said, it’s very flattering and hugs my shape nicely. The material is a medium thickness with fine corduroy lines, and the color is exactly like the picture. Comfortable as long as I sit up straight and avoid buffet tables. Overall — good price, cute dress, and worth it if you stay the same size or enjoy living on the edge. Read more
items.author: PollyEstherPants

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall/Winter dress
items.body: Buttery soft! Size was perfect for me. I’m 5’5.5” 165 lbs with a large bust. Buttons laid flat; did not gap like so many button-up blouses/dresses on me. Color is rich and classy. Love having the pockets! Read more
items.author: Tim Smyer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Belt not included
items.body: Beautuful dress but had no belt in delivery bag. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has the R,L, look.
items.body: I have ordered two of these dresses, They take a while to come in, but they are gorgeous!! Beautifuly made, comfortable, wash like a dream, Definitely has the "Ralph Lauren" look!! Read more
items.author: LJL

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Top measurements are wrong, too small.
items.body: Great quality, I love the dress, but the breast size is wayyyy wrong. It smashed my breast down it was so small. I am returning it. Read more
items.author: Helen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor packaging
items.body: Love the dress. It is very soft and fits well. NOTpleased with the shipping pkg. The cheap single bag was open on the plastic zip end. The dress is dirty where it was open. Read more
items.author: cheryl sylvester

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, Pink, Olive Green, Apricot, Dark Blue, Camel Printed, Coffee, Bright Green, Red Printed. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
